com.sap.dirigible.ide.repository.ui.viewer

Class RepositoryViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.dirigible.ide.repository.ui.viewer.RepositoryViewer

  • public class RepositoryViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a TreeViewer class responsible for displaying the contents of a repository.

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Refreshes the viewer.

        This method is useful for example when resources in the repository have been changed to force the view to display the changes.
